co.uk.niadel.mpi.annotations

Class AnnotationHandlerRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.annotations.AnnotationHandlerRegistry

  • public final class AnnotationHandlerRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Where you add annotations that are used by N-API MPIs or libraries to add Annotation functionality.
    Author:
    Niadel

public static final void callAllMethodHandlers(java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations,
